#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#define M 1000100
using namespace std;
bool solve[M];
int cnt[M];
main()
{
    int i,j,k,t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        int n,m,x,y;
        scanf("%d %d",&n,&m);
        fill(solve,solve+n,true);
        fill(cnt,cnt+n,0);
        int hi=2;
        int neg=1;
        for(i=0;i<m;i++)
        {
            scanf("%d %d",&x,&y);
            x--;
            y--;
            if(x>y)
            {
                swap(x,y);
            }
            cnt[x]++;
            solve[y]=false;
        }
        for(i=n-1;i>=0;i--)
        {
            if(solve[i])
            {
                if(cnt[i]==n-1-i)
                {
                    printf("%d %d\n",hi,i+1);
                    break;
                }
            }
        }
        if(i==-1)
        {
            printf("%d\n",neg);
        }
    }
}
